content: leg warmers dawn wang pattern notes this pattern is super flexible and easy to follow trust me this was my first knitting project you can add or remove stitches and row as needed to get desired width and length this pattern can also be worked flat and sewed together at the seam 10 ply worsted yarn can also be used with 5 mm needles and casting on 48 stitches please add your project photos and progress on ravelry i would love to see it materials directions make 2 8ply/light worsted/dk yarn of choice long tail co 72 sts 4 mm dpns or circular needles yarn needle round 1 k2 p2 to end of round gauge repeat round 1 until piece measures 22 sts 24 row = 10 cm/4 in over st desired length or 35 cm 99 row st flexible/not very important bobble loosely in rib size one size adjustable weave in ends abbreviations finished measurements can adjust for own measurements bobble bind off co cast on 20 cm/7 9 in circumference unstretched x 35 cm/13 8 in long k knit p purl round round sts stitches st st stockinette stitch
